trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: In certain situations and for specific types, multiple packaging progress events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，針對特定類型中，多個封裝進度事件發生在相同的時間。

trans-unit.source: These logically distinct, but temporally identical, events are combined into a single <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent> and `numberCompleted` is more than 1.
trans-unit.target: 這些邏輯，但優勢完全相同，事件就會結合到單一<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>和`numberCompleted`大於 1。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you print, font subsetting is performed every four pages.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您列印時，字型子集設定執行每隔四頁。

trans-unit.source: Each page must be cached until the subsetting is complete, and then all four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 必須快取每個頁面，直到子集設定完成，然後所有四個和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>在同一時間發生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>

trans-unit.source: The constructor for the resulting <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs> sets `action` to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> and sets `numberCompleted` to 4.
trans-unit.target: 產生的建構函式<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>設定`action`至<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>並設定`numberCompleted`為 4。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a package consists of a single four-page document that uses one font and no images or other resources, the sequence of events might occur as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果封裝包含單一的四頁文件使用一個字型和任何映像或其他資源，事件的順序可能會發生下表所示。

trans-unit.source: **The sequence of events for a simple package** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1
trans-unit.target: **簡單封裝的事件順序**AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1

trans-unit.source: The action that the packaging process is currently performing.
trans-unit.target: 在封裝程序目前正在執行的動作。

trans-unit.source: The number of simultaneous times that the specified `action` occurred.
trans-unit.target: 同時次數的指定`action`發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates what action is currently occurring in the packaging process.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出目前封裝程序中發生何種動作。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction"></xref> that represents the part of the packaging process that is currently occurring.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction"> </xref> ，代表目前發生在封裝程序的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of simultaneous times that the action that is identified in <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得同步的次數中識別的動作<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>發生。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>

trans-unit.source: In certain situations and for specific types, multiple packaging progress events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，針對特定類型中，多個封裝進度事件發生在相同的時間。

trans-unit.source: These logically distinct, but temporally identical, events are combined into a single <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent> and NumberCompleted is more than 1.
trans-unit.target: 這些邏輯，但優勢完全相同，事件就會結合到單一<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>NumberCompleted 且超過 1。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsPackagingPolicy.PackagingProgressEvent>

trans-unit.source: For example, when you print, font subsetting is performed every four pages.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您列印時，字型子集設定執行每隔四頁。

trans-unit.source: Each page must be cached until the subsetting is complete, and then all four <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> events occur at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 必須快取每個頁面，直到子集設定完成，然後所有四個和<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>在同一時間發生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs> sets <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> and sets NumberCompleted to 4.
trans-unit.target: 產生<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>設定<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A>至<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction>和 NumberCompleted 將設為 4。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingAction> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a package consists of a single four-page document that uses one font and no images or other resources, the sequence of events might occur as shown in the following table: **The sequence of events for a simple package** AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果封裝包含單一的四頁文件使用一個字型和任何映像或其他資源，事件的順序可能會發生下表所示︰**的簡單封裝的事件順序**AddingDocumentSequence 1 AddingFixedDocument 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 AddingFixedPage 1 FontAdded 1 FixedPageCompleted 4 FixedDocumentCompleted 1 DocumentSequenceCompleted 1 XpsDocumentCommitted 1

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the number of simultaneous times that the action that is identified in <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> has occurred.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>表示同步的次數，識別中的動作<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*>發生。</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.PackagingProgressEventArgs.Action*> </xref:System.Int32>
